name: Touchscreen Joystick for Phaser 3
description:
A touchscreen joystick made with phaser3-rex-plugins for Phaser 3 Framework.

The touchscreen joystick mimics the keyboard keys ("up", "right", "down", "left") and moves the object in 8 directions, they both work on this example.

Get the code at https://github.com/Acquati/touchscreen-joystick-for-phaser-3
